headline.main: U.S. Admiral, in China, Says Freedom of Navigation Operations No Threat
headline.print_headline: U.S. Admiral, in China, Says Freedom of Navigation Operations No Threat

docs.snippet: Freedom of navigation operations by the United States should not be viewed as a threat, U.S. Pacific Command commander Admiral Harry Harris said on Tuesday after a U.S. warship challenged China's territorial assertions in the disputed South China ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Freedom of navigation operations by the United States should not be viewed as a threat, U.S. Pacific Command commander Admiral Harry Harris said on Tuesday after a U.S. warship challenged China's territorial assertions in the disputed South China Sea last week.

headline.main: Lupul, Reimer Lead Maple Leafs to 4-1 Win Over Stars
headline.print_headline: Lupul, Reimer Lead Maple Leafs to 4-1 Win Over Stars

docs.snippet: Joffrey Lupul had two goals and an assist, James Reimer stopped 43 shots, and the Toronto Maple Leafs bet the Dallas Stars 4-1 Monday night to pick up their first home win of the season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Joffrey Lupul had two goals and an assist, James Reimer stopped 43 shots, and the Toronto Maple Leafs bet the Dallas Stars 4-1 Monday night to pick up their first home win of the season.

headline.main: Amnesty: Shell Has Not Cleaned Up Oil Spills in Nigeria
headline.print_headline: Amnesty: Shell Has Not Cleaned Up Oil Spills in Nigeria

docs.snippet: Oil giant Shell is "blatantly false" when it claims it is cleaning up spills that continue to destroy the livelihoods of hundreds of thousands of Nigerians, Amnesty International said Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Oil giant Shell is "blatantly false" when it claims it is cleaning up spills that continue to destroy the livelihoods of hundreds of thousands of Nigerians, Amnesty International said Tuesday.

headline.main: Activision Blizzard to Buy 'Candy Crush' Maker King for $5.9 Billion
headline.print_headline: Activision Blizzard to Buy 'Candy Crush' Maker King for $5.9 Billion

docs.snippet: Video game maker Activision Blizzard Inc said it will buy "Candy Crush Saga" creator King Digital Entertainment for $5.9 billion to strengthen its games portfolio....
docs.lead_paragraph: Video game maker Activision Blizzard Inc said it will buy "Candy Crush Saga" creator King Digital Entertainment for $5.9 billion to strengthen its games portfolio.

headline.main: UN Officials: 2 US Contractors Detained at Yemen Airport
headline.print_headline: UN Officials: 2 US Contractors Detained at Yemen Airport

docs.snippet: United Nations officials say two American contractors have been detained at the airport in Yemen's capital, Sanaa, which is controlled by Shiite Houthi rebels....
docs.lead_paragraph: United Nations officials say two American contractors have been detained at the airport in Yemen's capital, Sanaa, which is controlled by Shiite Houthi rebels.

headline.main: China to Prosecute Former Head of Xinjiang Border Guards
headline.print_headline: China to Prosecute Former Head of Xinjiang Border Guards

docs.snippet: Prosecutors plan to bring charges of selling promotions against the former head of border guards in China's strategically key northwestern region of Xinjiang, the ruling Communist Party said Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prosecutors plan to bring charges of selling promotions against the former head of border guards in China's strategically key northwestern region of Xinjiang, the ruling Communist Party said Tuesday.

headline.main: Harden Leads Rockets to First Win, 110-105 Over Thunder
headline.print_headline: Harden Leads Rockets to First Win, 110-105 Over Thunder

docs.snippet: James Harden scored 37 points, and the Houston Rockets beat the Oklahoma City Thunder 110-105 on Monday night for their first win of the season....
docs.lead_paragraph: James Harden scored 37 points, and the Houston Rockets beat the Oklahoma City Thunder 110-105 on Monday night for their first win of the season.

headline.main: Nissan Test Car Drives Itself Safely, Recognizes Pedestrians
headline.print_headline: Nissan Test Car Drives Itself Safely, Recognizes Pedestrians

docs.snippet: Being a passenger in a self-driving car is similar to being driven around by a very cautious person, maybe your grandmother....
